price: 16. Waxay leeyihiin gudaheeda (Jannada) waxay doonaan iyagoo ku waadhaya; waa yabooh ku habboon in la weydiisto Rabbigaa6.
arabic: لَّهُمۡ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ خَٰلِدِينَۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعۡدٗا مَّسۡـُٔولٗا
footnotes: 6. Waa yabooh ay malaa’igta u dalbaan mu’miniinta oo Alle uga baryaan, mu’miniintana sidoo kale Alle weydiistaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā mā yashāūna khālidīna kāna ʿalā rabbika waʿdan masūlan
